summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney to defense counsel in the case US v. Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330 (AJN), dated November 23, 2021. The email transmits a supplemental discovery production, including witness materials and exhibits, to be delivered via USAfx and a physical disc for the defendant.

events.title: Discovery Production in US v. Maxwell
events.description: The US Attorney's Office sends a supplemental discovery production to defense counsel, including testifying witness material, non-testifying witness material, and exhibits, with a physical disc to be delivered to the defendant in court.

locations.name: Southern District of New York
locations.context: Jurisdiction of the US Attorney's Office handling the case.

locations.name: One St. Andrew's Plaza
locations.context: Address of the United States Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

keyFacts: The document is a discovery transmission email in the criminal case US v. Maxwell (20 Cr. 330).
A supplemental production of testifying witness material, non-testifying witness material, and exhibits was ready for delivery to defense counsel on November 23, 2021.
The production was to be delivered electronically via USAfx and a physical disc was to be brought to court for the defendant, Ms. Maxwell.
The defense counsel team included Christian Everdell, Laura Menninger, and Jeff Pagliuca.
